title: Looking for sup, adc or mid laner to join our ranked 5's team
body:
Hi guys,
we are looking for mid, adc or sup to join our team. 
Silver or gold players are welcome.
Please add in game name: TrollinInTheDeep

replies.body:
hey im keen to join if you want. im gold 5 and i main support. im ign is Dragonrend. i hope can play. 

Thanks,

Dragonrend

**Name: **TheCuddleBear
**Rank:** B3
**Main role/Main roles: **Adc/mid
**Champ pool:** Pretty much all adcs and some mid laners
im currently ranked silver 4 have been gold 3 just decayded over time looking for a team I am a ADC/SUPORT MAIN

Heya,

Gold Mid laner looking to join a 5's team :)
My roles in favorite order : Mid > Support > Top > Jungle > adc

Hit me up in game :)
Hey I'm a silver player been playing for a long time so I have mains in each role and can fill to what the team needs I'll give you an add tonight :)
